tool_description: Extracts and aggregates current compensation data including wages, salaries, and overtime rates for specified employee groups or bargaining units.

employee_group.description: Employee group or bargaining unit identifier

data_source.description: Source system or database name for compensation data

error_messages: Invalid employee group: The specified employee group does not exist in the system. Verify the group identifier.
Data source unavailable: The specified data source cannot be accessed. Check system connectivity and permissions.
Invalid time period: Time period must be a positive integer representing months. Use values between 1 and 60.
usage: Provide employee_group and data_source to extract compensation data. Optionally specify time_period for historical analysis depth. Returns aggregated compensation statistics.

total_employees.description: Total number of employees in the group

overtime_percentage.description: Percentage of employees regularly working overtime
